song.title: Let it Rain
song.lyrics:
[C] . C#m7 A Let it rain, let it rain .E B Open the flood gates of Heaven
[V] . A2 We feel the rains of Your love . C#m7 We feel the winds of Your Spirit || . E B Now the heartbeat of heaven, let us hear
[INSTRUMENTAL] . Amaj7 Bsus C#m7 Bsus
[B] . Amaj7 We want to see You, . Bsus Show us Your glory . C#m7 Bsus We want to know You more
song.presentation: C V C V C B C
